title: FS: Over 100 Graded Tobacco Cards (C46, Obaks, T20*, T210) *Offers are welcome*
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: Over 100 Graded Tobacco Cards (C46, Obaks, T20*, T210) *Offers are welcome*
posts.post_content:
Payment: MO are accepted. While I greatly prefer PayPal Payment Owed, it is up to the buyer. PayPal Goods is absolutely fine with me. I won't ask for 3%, nor will a deal ever be hinged on it. It's entirely dependent on the buyer if they would be willing to pay Payment Owed.



The best way to get in touch with me is e-mail. I will get to PMs when I am able!

Contact: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] 

If you would like to see a scan, contact me and I'll send them over.
